title.rendered: DIOR Menswear Spring/Summer 2022 – Street Style At Paris Fashion Week

content.rendered:
DIOR HOMME. PARIS, FRANCE - JUNE 25 VIP ENTRANCE

June 25th: Dior Homme has unveiled its new S/S 22 collection at Paris Fashion Week.

24Fashion TV brings you the most stylish of the VIP guests who attended the live fashion show for Dior Men S/S 2022. This was a legendary event held at the Htel des Invalides, Paris, France.

Bella Hadid - Model 

Olivier Rousteing - Director @Balmain

Yoann Zimmer - Belgian actor

Finnegan Oldfield - French actor

Alex Lutz - French actor

Mathilde Favier - Public Relations Manager 

Lukas Ionesco - Actor 

Benoit_Magimel - Actor

Jean Imbert - Chef 

Nicolas Maury - Actor

Arnaud Valois - Actor

Ouissem Belgacem - Football player 

Kai Millard Morris - Fashion designer and style influencer

Miss Fame - American model

Pelayo Diaz - Blogger

Germain Louvet - French dancer

Baptiste Giabiconi - Model 

Jackson Myles Chavis - Singer 

Photojournalist: Christina V Henningstad @christina_henningstad. Production: Fashionview for 24Fashion.tv
